page.title: 11TIMSBURY TRAFFIC SURVEY
page.content: We surveyed the traffic going through North Road,Timsbury for half an hour at 10 a.m.on an October Monday morning. TRAVEL DIRECTION: {EAST WEST 40 CARS 19 CARS 12 VANS 7 VANS 2 LORRIES 2 LORRIES 2 BICYCLES 0 BICYCLES 1 MOTOR BIKE 1 MOTOR BIKE 1 BUS 1 BUS 1 COACH 0 COACHES 1 EMERGENCY SERVICE 0 EMERGENCY S. 0 TRACTORS 1 TRACTOR {______________________________________ Cars are by far the most popular way of travelling.Most vehicles were heading towards Bath,our nearest city. { By Mark and Matthew.
